item.title: Trump, Zelenskyy hold high-stakes summit amid tensions over peace talks with Putin
item.description: The two leaders are set to sign a deal giving U.S. access to Ukraine's minerals.

item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: Trump set for high-stakes meeting with Zelenskyy
item.description: The two leaders held a bilateral meeting in the Oval Office.

item.title: 'The confinement is unbearable': Migrants describe being held at Guantanamo
item.description: Two of the 170 migrants authorities recently held for two weeks at the Guantanamo Bay naval base described the conditions in the detention facilities.

item.title: Could the federal layoffs impact the Virginia governor race?
item.description: Democrats in the state believe the impact being felt by the job cuts on the federal level by the Trump administration might sway voters and flip the g...

item.title: WATCH: Body camera shows deputy rescuing baby from burning apartment
item.description: A Barrow County Sheriff's deputy, along with a Winder Police officer in Georgia, rescued the baby trapped in a burning apartment.
